minidesc: Learn the fundamentals of CSS, the language behind millions of apps and enterprise systems. Our guide simplifies complex topics like object-oriented programming and data structures
title: Learn css
description:
Learn CSS Blog

What is CSS :

CSS, or Cascading Style Sheets, is a stylesheet language used to describe the presentation of a document written in a markup language like HTML. It controls everything from the colors and fonts to the layout and positioning of elements on a web page, effectively separating the content from its design.

      Some useful features

  1. Selectors
  2. Cascading
  3. Box Model
  4. Layout
  5. Responsiveness
  6. Animations and Transitions
